title: AWK split() returns field count - must capture return value
context: When parsing variable-length fields with AWK split(), NF refers to original line fields, not the split array size
problem: Used NF to iterate over split array f[], but NF was counting tab-separated fields in original line, not space-separated fields in split result
solution: Capture split() return value: n = split($0, f, /[ \t]+/); then use n instead of NF
